entries.name: new( first, second = nil )
entries.desc: Constructor.  The first argument can be one of three types: @param first If String, the contents of this comment are set to the argument.  If Comment, the argument is duplicated.  If Source, the argument is scanned for a comment. @param second If the first argument is a Source, this argument should be nil, not supplied, or a Parent to be set as the parent of this object

entries.name: <=>(other)
entries.desc: Compares this Comment to another; the contents of the comment are used in the comparison.

entries.name: ==( other )
entries.desc: Compares this Comment to another; the contents of the comment are used in the comparison.
